text: @ CarlaMarquez Monday 23:22 Hi Tram Nguyen, I've checked with Jason and the EDI Decrypt app can be only run on Prod server. We already have the job setup here with QA database connection. However, before executing please confirm the encryption/decryption folders are setup to point to QA, 5o it won't run files in production. Some folders in QA database are not updated and may still be pointing to production. 1
